name: Alpha Version KnightsInEternety
description:
The Alpha Version of the new Game  "KnightsInEternety" 

Explore,

Duell,

Collect

Use W,A,S,D, Space and the mouse to controll a Knight, lost in the infinit world of Etver.

Press E to see your Money, Wood, and Stone.

Use Q To toggle buying/selling Things.

Trade Stone with the Dwarf to get Money for Stone.

Trade Wood with The Forest Man to get Money for Wood.

Hit Trees and Stones to destroy them and get their Loot.

Added Deamons, Living in the Ashelands.
